subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
Australian Open (Tennis)
French Open (Tennis)
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: In New York, you can shop in an African art gallery, eat in an Uighur restaurant and dance in a Russian nightclub without leaving the five boroughs. You can also play on courts that replicate tennis’s four most prestigious tournaments.
snippet: In New York, you can shop in an African art gallery, eat in an Uighur restaurant and dance in a Russian nightclub without leaving the five boroughs. You can also play on courts that replicate tennis’s four most prestigious tournaments.
